name: Cosmic Top Secret
description: Play the incredible true story of T and her quest to uncover the truth about her parents’ work for the Danish Intelligence during the Cold War.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core™ i3 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 8000 series or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 500 series or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
